metadata.name: Adaptive Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
metadata.description: An adaptive breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the design includes a gradient overlay, hover effects, and a responsive layout that adjusts for mobile devices. The theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes with a smooth animation.
